decl.description:
`furo-ui5-radio-button-group`
The furo-ui5-radio-button-group component enables users to select a single option from a set of options.
When a furo-ui5-radio-button-group is selected by the user, the select event is fired.
When a furo-ui5-radio-button-group that is within a group is selected, the one that was previously selected gets automatically deselected.
You can group radio buttons by using the group-name property.

```
<furo-ui5-radio-button-group
   group-name="Option"
   ƒ-bind-data="--daoPerson(*.field_with_meta_options)">
</furo-ui5-radio-button-group>
```
```
<furo-ui5-radio-button-group
   group-name="Option"
   ƒ-bind-data="--daoPerson(*.field)">
     <ui5-radio-button text="Option A" selected name="Owner"></ui5-radio-button>
     <ui5-radio-button text="Option B with a very long text" name="Owner"></ui5-radio-button>
</furo-ui5-radio-button-group>
```
decl.name: FuroUi5RadioButtonGroup

members.name: bindData
members.description: overwrite bindData of FieldNodeAdapter

members.name: bindOptions
members.description: Here a RepeaterNode can be connected to the component as an option list.

members.name: readAttributes
members.description:
Reads the attributes which are set on the component dom.
those attributes can be set. `readonly`,`disabled`, `value-field-path`, `display-field-path`
Use this after manual or scripted update of the attributes.

members.name: onFnaFieldValueChanged
members.description: overwrite onFnaFieldValueChanged

members.name: onFnaReadonlyChanged
members.description: overwrite onFnaReadonlyChanged function

members.name: onFnaOptionsChanged
members.description:
Overwrite onFnaOptionsChanged
Notifies when the options for the field is changed or set.

members.name: selectOptionById
members.description: Selects an option by id

members.name: getValueByPath
members.description: Let you get an attribute value by path

members.name: _updateFNA
members.description:
Handler function for the select value changes.
This is done to be able to remove the event-listeners as a protection for multiple calls

members.name: _updateOptions
members.description: Maps and updates array of option

members.name: _tagRadioButton
members.description: Inner radio component tag

members.name: groupName
members.description: Defines the name of the inner radio button. Radio buttons with the same name will form a radio button group.

members.name: activeFieldBinding
members.description:
Flag to indicate if a field is attached
Default: false

members.name: idFieldPath
members.description:
Defines the field path that is used from the injected RepeaterNode to identify the option items.
Point-separated path to the field
E.g. data.partner.ulid
default: id

members.name: displayFieldPath
members.description:
Defines the field path that is used from the injected RepeaterNode to display the option items.
Point-separated path to the field
E.g. data.partner.display_name
default: display_name

members.name: valueFieldPath
members.description:
Defines the field path that is used to update the bound component if the user has selected an option.
Point-separated path to the field
Must be set if a data binding is specified.
default: id

members.name: _optionList
members.description:
Internal RepeaterNode
Defines the ui5-select options.
Note: Only one selected option is allowed. If more than one option is defined as selected, the last one would be considered as the selected one.

members.name: _labelsFromFAT
_privilegedAttributes
members.description:
a list of privileged attributes. when those attributes are set in furo-ui5-select components initially.
they can not be modified later via response or spec
null is used because getAttribute returns null or value
members.default:
{
      readonly: null,
      required: null,
      disabled: null,
      'id-field-path': 'id',
      'value-field-path': 'id',
      'display-field-path': 'display_name',
      'group-name': null,
    }

events.name: options-updated
events.description: Fires event options-updated after rebuilding option list.

type.text: {*} the value from the value-field. By default the value field is "id"

events.description: Fired when value has changed from the component inside. **bubbles**
events.name: value-changed

events.description: Fired when the radio button is selected.
events.name: item-selected

pkg.name: @furo/ui5
pkg.description: SAP UI5 Web Components data bindings for furo

scripts.docs:generate: npm run analyze:components && npm run analyze:typerenderer && ./scripts/cem.sh
